parameter.value: Yes, that's my mommy. She's done a great job raising me, for I will never give my flower away until I have given my hand away in marriage. So I would appreciate it if you quit trying to make advance on me, for if I were to inform my father...

My father, the great King Adyssian himself. I will never accept a mans request for my hand until they have gotten permission from my father. But don't hold your breath... I'm confident you don't have what it takes!
Ah yes, my hardened brother. Almost as protective as my father... the only difference is, he has no reputation to maintain, so he's not as hesitant as my father is. Remember that.
Why hello |PLAYERNAME| and welcome to Elderon's post office.
Here. Don't forget that you need to buy a label too if you want to send a parcel. Always write the name of the {receiver} in the first line and the name of the {city} in the second line.
